mapper.insert: insert into t_user (email, nick, pwd, user_img, mood_cd, genre_cd, situ_cd, stus_cd, last_dt, in_user, in_date, up_user, up_date) values(#{email}, #{nick}, #{pwd}, #{userImg}, #{moodCd}, #{genreCd}, #{situCd},#{stusCd}, #{lastDt}, #{inUser}, #{inDate}, #{upUser}, #{upDate})
